body:
`akantu` build fail in spack:
```
[root@Estuary-CentOS8 ~]# spack install -v akantu
==> Error: An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:

    boost@1.73.0%gcc@8.2.1+atomic+chrono~clanglibcpp~container~context~coroutine+date_time~debug+exception~fiber+filesystem+graph~icu+iostreams+locale+log+math~mpi+multithreaded~numpy~pic+program_options~python+random+regex+serialization+shared+signals~singlethreaded+system~taggedlayout+test+thread+timer~versionedlayout+wave cxxstd=98 visibility=hidden arch=linux-centos8-aarch64


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    akantu@3.0.0%gcc@8.2.1+mpi~python build_type=RelWithDebInfo external_solvers=none arch=linux-centos8-aarch64
        ^cmake@3.18.1%gcc@8.2.1~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos8-aarch64
            ^ncurses
                ^pkgconfig
            ^openssl
                ^perl@5.14.0:
                    ^berkeley-db
                    ^gdbm
                        ^readline
                ^zlib


akantu requires boost version :1.66, but spec asked for 1.73.0
```
title: Installation issue:  akantu
